messages.body: $TSLA Tesla fans can catch a glimpse of the Model 3 at the L.A. Auto Show right now. https://stocknews.com/news/tsla-l-a-auto-show-gives-tesla-inc-tsla-a-chance-to/

links.title: L.A. Auto Show Gives Tesla Inc (TSLA) A Chance To Show Off Model 3
links.description: Tesla Inc (NASDAQ:TSLA) continues to have trouble producing its new Model 3 sedan in mass quantities. Hundreds of thousands of would-be buyers have plunked down a $1,000 deposit to buy the electric vehicle, but so far only a handful have actually received one.

links.title: Analyst jokes Musk will make it to Mars with SpaceX before Tesla is profitable
links.description: Nicholas Kamm | AFP | Getty Images It appears even international analysts are poking fun at Tesla's Elon Musk. German bank Nord/LB initiated coverage of electric car maker not only with a sell rating, but with quips making fun of the company's top executive.

messages.body: $TSLA https://www.cnbc.com/2017/12/01/jpmorgan-has-a-new-short-idea-tesla-shares-to-fall-40-percent-in-12-months.html

links.title: JPMorgan has a new short idea: Tesla shares to fall 40% in 12 months
links.description: JPMorgan is advising investors to bet against shares of electric car-maker Tesla because the company is likely raise more capital, diluting its stock. Also, competition from other automakers will increase, with some established auto giants looking to reap benefits from government subsidies, wrote analyst Ryan Brinkman.

messages.body:
Tesla doomed to fail like LeEco? Jia Yueting's empire collapsed after he overextended. Will it happen to Musk
https://seekingalpha.com/article/4129138-tesla-doomed-fail-like-leeco $TSLA

links.title: Is Tesla Doomed To Fail Like LeEco?
links.description: If you are a regular reader of Tesla ( TSLA) articles, you would be very familiar with the narratives of the comments from the opposing camps. The key themes from the bears are: Tesla's negative cash flow would crush the company sooner or later, Tesla doesn't make a profit from its products, Tesla's competitors would quickly capture its market share, and Elon Musk's guidance/promises would not materialize.
